products.name: Sony 55" 4K UHD HDR LED Android Smart TV (XBR55X850D)
products.shortDescription: Not just 4K. This is Sony 4K. This 55" Sony Smart TV delivers stunning true-to-life images in 4K UHD resolution. HDR compatibility delivers a wider colour spectrum for an even more immersive viewing experience. It runs Android TV and has built-in Wi-Fi to give you instant access to your favourite streaming services, like YouTube and Neflix.

products.name: Samsung 50" 1080p LED Smart Hub Smart TV (UN50J5200AFXZC)
products.shortDescription: Go beyond regular TV with the Samsung J5200 Smart TV. Experience vivid, lifelike colour and smooth, seamless action in stunning Full HD 1080p from this 50" LED backlit display. Smart TV technology gives you access to tons of entertainment choices like web browsing, social media, and streaming content services thanks to built-in WiFi and Ethernet.

products.name: Google Chromecast
products.shortDescription: The entertainment options are endless. The new Chromecast plugs into your TV's HDMI port to open up a world of entertainment -- controlled through your mobile device. Cast TV shows, movies, music, or games from your favourite apps, and discover new apps, features, and recommendations through the Chromecast app.

products.name: Insignia 32" 720p LED TV (NS-32D310NA17) - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: The compact size of this Insignia 32" LED TV makes it easy to put high quality, high definition entertainment in just about any room in your home. The 1366 x 768 HD screen with Direct LED backlit technology will make your movies and TV shows look amazingly sharp and clear.

products.name: Samsung 55" 4K UHD LED Tizen Smart TV (UN55JS7000FXZC) - Metal Line
products.shortDescription: Your TV experience redefined. That's what you can expect from the Samsung JS7000 series 55" 4K SUHD LED Smart TV. Nano-Crystal technology and 4K UHD resolution deliver dynamic brightness, enhanced contrast, and lifelike colour for a truly immersive viewing experience that'll blow you away. Motion control-ready (additional accessory required).

products.name: Insignia 40" 1080p HD LED TV (NS-40D510NA17) - Black - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: Kick back and soak in the impressive visuals of this 40" Full HD LED TV from Insignia. Featuring Full HD 1080p resolution, it delivers crystal-clear picture quality so you can enjoy all your entertainment in vivid detail. It's also equipped with HDMI inputs so you can easily connect your home theatre components.

products.shortDescription: High definition entertainment awaits you with this Toshiba 43" TV. It has Full HD 1080p resolution for crisp, detailed images and a 60Hz refresh rate for smooth, clear video, especially during fast action. Integrated DTS TruSurround delivers an immersive sound experience and 3 HMDI ports lets you hook up gaming consoles, DVD players, and other devices.

products.name: Samsung 55" 1080p LED Smart TV (UN55J6201AFXZC)
products.shortDescription: Watch your favourite movies in spectacular Full HD quality with Samsung's 55" J6201 LED Smart TV. ConnectShare Movie also lets you plug in your USB to watch movies, play music, and more.

With 3 HDMI inputs you've got lots of options for connecting gaming consoles and other A/V components.

products.name: Philips 55" 4K UHD LED Smart TV (55PFL6900/F7) - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: Experience the breadth of Ultra HD with the Philips 55PFL6900 55" 4K Smart TV. Whether you're watching a travel documentary, action thriller, or music video, you'll experience incredible clarity and realism. Integrated WiFi and Philips' NetTV brings you a wealth of online entertainment.

products.name: Roku Streaming Stick
products.shortDescription: The Roku Streaming Stick is your key to unlock a world of limitless entertainment. Don't let this pocket-size device fool you, it houses a powerful quad-core processor with dual band wireless for smooth streaming in your home, dorm, or hotel. Roku works with all top movie and TV streaming services, including Netflix, Google Play, and YouTube.

products.name: Sony 32" 1080p LED Smart TV (KDL32W700B)
products.shortDescription: Get sucked into entertainment on the Sony KDL32W700 32" LED Smart TV. Boasting Full HD resolution and Motionflow XR 240 technology, this TV makes everything from movies to sports appear razor sharp. Built-in WiFi allows you to enjoy a wealth of online content, while various ports keep your home theatre components connected.

products.name: Insignia 24" 720p LED Smart Roku TV (NS-24ER310CA17) - Only at Best Buy

Its dual band WiFi means you'll enjoy fast and reliable streaming.

products.name: Samsung 60" 4K UHD LED Tizen Smart TV (UN60JU6390FXZC)
products.shortDescription: Go beyond high definition and enter the immersive world of 4K with the 60" Samsung JU6390 Ultra HD LED Smart TV. Images come to life with vibrant colour and vivid texture thanks to a 3840 x 2160 resolution display. With WiFi, HDMI, and USB connectivity, it features up-scaling technology, Motion Rate 120, and runs on the powerful open-source Tizen OS.

products.name: VIZIO 32" 1080p LED Smart TV (D32x-D1)
products.shortDescription: Get the popcorn ready because the VIZIO D-series 32" LED Smart TV is here to play all your blockbusters in stunning Full HD. Full-array LED backlighting delivers superb light uniformity and picture quality, while the 60Hz refresh rate ensures fast-action scenes appear smooth. Stream shows on Netflix or load content from a hard drive or gaming console.

products.name: Samsung 50" 1080p LED Tizen Smart TV (UN50J6300AFXZC)
products.shortDescription: The Samsung 50" 1080p LED Tizen Smart OS TV is just the right centrepiece for your home theatre. The full array LED display delivers Full HD picture quality, and makes a great fit for your living room or entertainment space. Connect to your wireless network, and stream a wide variety of online content directly from the Smart TV or your mobile device.

products.name: LG 49" 4K UHD HDR LED webOS 3.0 Smart TV (49UH6100)

With 4 times the resolution of Full HD, this TV displays jaw-dropping detail for everything from your favourite wildlife series to the latest blockbuster. Features like webOS 3.0 and HDR Pro combine to deliver a truly immersive and intuitive viewing experience like never before.

products.name: Google Chromecast Audio
products.shortDescription: Bring big sound to your favourite tunes with Chromecast Audio. This small device plugs into a speaker, so you can cast music from your mobile device to your powerful home speaker. Because it works over WiFi, Chromecast Audio won't drain your phone's battery, doesn't require pairing, and lets you use your phone for other things when you're casting.

products.name: Samsung 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player with Built-in WiFi (UBD-K8500/ZC)

It features HDR technology and offers UHD upscaling to enhance the image quality of standard Blu-ray discs and DVDs. Built-in Wi-Fi gives you access to instant streaming content and this Smart Blu-ray player is 4K streaming service ready.

products.name: MyGica Streaming Media Player (ATV600)
products.shortDescription: Don't have a smart TV? Make it smart in an instant with the MyGica ATV600 TV box. It gives you a world of entertainment possibilities at your fingertips. Just connect it to your TV with an HDMI cable and you can surf the net, look at photos, play music, watch Netflix and YouTube content, and a whole lot more in up to beautiful Full HD resolution.

products.name: Insignia 55" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (NS-55D510NA17) - Black/Gloss - Only at Best Buy

DTS audio powers fantastic sound that pulls you deeper and deeper into your favourite flicks.

products.name: VIZIO 65" 4K UHD LED Smart TV (D65u-D2)
